query: UPDATE tasks SET assignedTo = JSON_EXTRACT(assignedTo, '$[0]') WHERE assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND JSON_TYPE(JSON_EXTRACT(assignedTo, '$[0]')) = 'ARRAY';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2YxFwjaS6n4EGE7.031ea3147ddd --database 5dPSLyh58e9tDjPvGLCuzX --execute UPDATE tasks SET assignedTo = JSON_EXTRACT(assignedTo, '$[0]') WHERE assignedTo IS NOT NULL AND JSON_TYPE(JSON_EXTRACT(assignedTo, '$[0]')) = 'ARRAY';
